line.comment: * Wait for starting options to be answered.
* Also wait for full generation of the galaxy.
* during Global Alliance Protectorates cannot expire
* ongoing Coordinated Invasions prevent the sector claim from expiring
* refresh player's truces (only the 'non-aggression pacts' he manually signed)
*Truces refresh constantly if both partners still want peace
* Coordinated Invasion safety checks (same is in ZH.CI.GoCode, gets frequently called by each member once in standby position)
* when a squadron leader dies sometimes a follower ends up being a member, we remove them here
* members without rally gate to go to sometimes seem to happen if the fleet leader switching messes up. They would block the entire operation so we also remove them

sval.val: Wait for starting options to be answered.
Also wait for full generation of the galaxy.
during Global Alliance Protectorates cannot expire
ongoing Coordinated Invasions prevent the sector claim from expiring
refresh player's truces (only the 'non-aggression pacts' he manually signed)
Truces refresh constantly if both partners still want peace
Coordinated Invasion safety checks (same is in ZH.CI.GoCode, gets frequently called by each member once in standby position)
when a squadron leader dies sometimes a follower ends up being a member, we remove them here
members without rally gate to go to sometimes seem to happen if the fleet leader switching messes up. They would block the entire operation so we also remove them
